name: Lidya
description: LIDYA is a crypto asset developed by Bitci Borsa Teknoloji Anonim Limited on Bitcichain. LIDYA TOKEN is a digital asset designed to provide its holders with high-yield staking opportunities, aiming for them to earn passive income. LIDYA TOKEN holders have the chance to increase their holdings of LIDYA by taking advantage of the high-yield staking opportunities they will obtain.
